problem_text: Points P, Q, and R are the midpoints of J K, K L, and J L, respectively. Find x.
compact_text: Points P, Q, and R are the midpoints of JK, KL, and JL, respectively. Find x.
annotat_text: Points $P$, $Q$, and $R$ are the midpoints of $\overline{J K}$, $\overline{K L}$, and $\overline{J L}$, respectively. Find $x$ .
